ProjectTitle: GLOSRAD - Global Shutter Radiation-tolerant CMOS image sensor pixels
InitialFeedbackHistory: 24/05/2023 IOF asks for a DMP describing data managent specific for your project and using the [REDACTED] standard DMP template, you can find this in DMPonline.be (or use the word template that FWO provides), you can find more guidance on our RDM website: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp. [REDACTED] you like to book a meeting with a domain specific RDM expert for more advise on how to develop a DMP please contact onderzoek2bergen@kuleuven.be
label: good with suggestions
